page.title: 07LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: Parish has Council of 7 members, is part of Craven District of North Yorkshire and shares services of 2 District Councillors, a County Councillor and the M.P. for Skipton & Ripon constituency. It provides most lighting within the village ; an increased parish rate of 6p has allowed improvements to 2 lights & the installation of a new one. On 2 housing estates lighting is financed by the District Council. Local/County Councils work together to conserve footpaths. Application made for a closed riverside path to be added to the Definitive Map ; a vandalised footbridge restored. District & County services include distribution of pensioners' bus tokens, mobile library & a monthly clinic for mothers and children.Efforts of local Council have brought gas to the village.
